text: In musical performance, a solo is a piece or a section of a piece that is played or sung by a single performer. This performer is called a soloist. A soloist can be a singer or an instrumentalist. Solos are common in classical music and jazz. In popular music, a solo is an improvised melodyMiller, Michael (2004). The Complete Idiot's Guide to Solos & Improv. . played by a single performer, such as a guitar solo. In the country music genre a solo is known as a ride. ==Related pages== *Concerto *Virtuoso ==References== Category:Musical forms
title: Solo (music)
